verses.name: Mark 3:8
verses.text: And from Jerusalem, and from Idumea, and from beyond Jordan; and they about Tyre and Sidon, a great multitude, when they had heard what great things he did, came unto him.

verses.name: Mark 3:9
verses.text: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.

verses.name: Mark 3:10
verses.text: For he had healed many; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him, as many as had plagues.

verses.name: Mark 3:11
verses.text: And unclean spirits, when they saw him, fell down before him, and cried, saying, Thou art the Son of God.
